title: Mobile Microlearning for Transformative Science Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Designing transformative learning experiences for professionals (medical/legal/technical) to solve everyday scientific problems

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more strategies for applying scientific principles to solve everyday problems
Learners can generate practical cases related to scientific thinking five or more times per week through microlearning modules
Learners can demonstrate engagement levels of 4.0/5.0 or higher in transformative experience surveys

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
